revision.text:
{{codepointer|Weapon attack}} '''A_FireAssaultGun'''
(no parameters)
This is the attacking function of [[Strife]]'s [[Classes:AssaultGun|assault gun]]. It plays the sound "''weapons/assaultgun''" and then fires bullets whose accuracy is dependent on how many [[Classes:UpgradeAccuracy|accuracy upgrades]] the player has received.
== Examples == Taked from [[Classes:AssaultGun|assault gun]] fire state: Fire: RIFF AB 3 A_FireAssaultGun RIFG D 3 A_FireAssaultGun RIFG C 0 [[A_ReFire]] RIFG B 2 [[A_Light0]] Goto Ready
